text:
I have one application ,it developed by using the "Websocket", So I do not be able to record some scenarios where "Websocket" is used.

Any help.
creator: tarunpatel71@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
As of JMeter 2.8 and upcoming 2.9, Websocket is not supported.
I requalify as Enhancement.

creator: ravikanth.sadhuneni@gmail.com
text: when can we expect websocket sampler?
My app initiates a connection with websocket server in login page. I can not record the login. I think it's for lack of support protocol websocket.
creator: ricardo.longa@gmail.com
ophir.prusak@blazemeter.com
text:
There is now a third party websocket protocol plugin:
https://github.com/maciejzaleski/JMeter-WebSocketSampler

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
As of November 2017, the best Websocket Sampler for Apache JMeter is this 3rd party plugin:

- https://bitbucket.org/pjtr/jmeter-websocket-samplers

Maybe author would at some step like to donate it to core project.
In the meantime I don't think we will invest time on this as we have a lot of work and are resource constrained for now.
